resources.string: Chaplet Of The Sacred Heart Of Jesus

string.name: txt
string.font: Soul of Christ, sanctify me, Body of Christ, save me, Blood of Christ, inebriate me, Water from Christâ€™s side, Wash me, Passion of Christ, Strengthen me, O good Jesus, hear me, Within Thy wounds hide me, Suffer me not to be separated from Thee, From the malicious enemy, defend me In the hour of my death, call me, And bid me come unto Thee, That I may praise Thee with Thy saints and with Thy Angels forever and ever. Amen.\n\n
Jesus, meek and humble of heart, make my heart like unto Thine.
Sweet Heart of Jesus, be thou my love.

font.b: At the end of each mystery:\n

string.font: Sweet Heart of Mary, be thou my salvation.

Sacred Heart of Jesus, have mercy on us. Immaculate Heart of Mary, pray for us. May the Sacred Heart of Jesus be praised, glorified, loved, and preserved throughout the world now and forever more. Amen.
